item.title: Semana de la ciencia y tecnica 2021
item.author: leohoet98@gmail.com (Leonardo Hoet)
item.description: Se llevó a cabo la semana de la ciencia y técnica desde el 20/09/2021 hasta el 27/09/2021. Nuestro grupo tuvo el honor de participar con 4 presentaciones de primera calidad

item.title: Release planning problem
item.author: leohoet98@gmail.com (Leonardo Hoet)
item.description: A more powerful model than the next release problem which can provide a schedule of how a project need to plan its releases.

item.title: Next release problem
item.author: leohoet98@gmail.com (Leonardo Hoet)
item.description: A common problem in every software project is which requirement should the team implement in order to satisfy stakeholders' needs. In this blog, we aim to define a formal model that can help us with this problem.

item.title: Hello World
item.author: leohoet98@gmail.com (Leonardo Hoet)
item.description: Hello world! This is our first blog post! We plan to use this blog as a form of divulgation about what we do. Stay tuned to see more!

item.title: About
item.author: leohoet98@gmail.com (Leonardo Hoet)
item.description: About us We are an investigation group from UTN FRCU
